assessments.status_rationale: No Eurostat flash HICP figure for October 2025 appears in the cited coverage; release typically lands around month-end. No clear evidence to score yet.

The BLS Employment Situation release is due in early November; no wage growth data is cited in the articles.
October CPI is due mid-November; no CPI figures are reported in the provided news.
No explicit VIX closing levels are cited. Threshold event by 2025-11-30 cannot be confirmed or rejected yet.
No DXY close is provided in the news. The at-least-once threshold has not been evidenced.
No Brent front-month settlement values are reported. Cannot verify a ≤ $82.00 occurrence.
No weekly initial jobless claims figures are included. The ≤205,000 criterion remains unverified.
No ISM Services report details are referenced. The New Orders Index reading for October is not available in the coverage.
No Bank of England decision headlines are present. The early-November rate decision has not been reported here.
Apple’s earnings are covered, with mentions of record results and strong Services, but the specific Services YoY growth percentage is not provided in the cited articles.
